name: The Oversoul
description:
In the Metaverse, there are some trapped memories called 'souls' which wander the universe for various reasons. 
Shithead meets one of them which turned out as his ancient ancestor, the legendary samurai 'Shittomaru', who seek his lifetime rival (friend) to settle one unfinished battle. 
In order to help his ancestor, shithead lets himself to become shittomaru's medium to do oversoul, reanimate the power of Shittomaru to battle its living rival 'Butomaru' 

this artwork is inspired from one of my favorite manga-anime series since I was young, can you guess what is it? 
I put the first orb, one of the seven Shit Balls, hidden on this artwork, look for it and have fun! clue: somehow the orbs can change their colors 

5000x3500px
